code: import persistReducer from"./reducers/index";import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import{persistStore}from"redux-persist";var composeEnhancers=composeWithDevTools({});export var store=createStore(persistReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));export var persistor=persistStore(store);
